data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=g8pLXug5dP4Q7kNvgGz4O28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD_DXAWNkG4D3Y6kH6JPOsB7WFh5D_0eIlx-LYBJ3_uxA&oe=668928B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=NoCDCCQsr3gQ7kNvgEzCFji&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAM1Q5Ri7aLi2GZYz_lhxj9AcU7gWPyTVIzed4tjcmlzQ&oe=66893652)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gIf8zrjk1Z4Q7kNvgGKpCpC&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD3oGhSPh6JcGgrBPUaW3hZ3xdj3jokFPsRXuQbWUmSXw&oe=66892189)
